title: Strengthening Service Quality Practice Competencies: Evolution and Role Redefinition of Instructional Designers—A Mixed-Methods Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate instructional design processes using mixed research methods.
Learners can explain at least three core competencies required of learning designers in the digital transformation era.
Learners can present evidence-based arguments for the necessity of developing a hybrid job classification system.
Learners can design and apply at least two formative assessment tools in microlearning environments.
Learners can develop case-based learning design strategies for educational innovation in science.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
